pr_title: Fix not escaping special characters in search pattern

timeline.message:
Fix not escaping special characters in search pattern

fixes #5892

* add method to get search pattern for searched words with escaped
 javascript regexp special characters (for search without regular
 expressions)

* in preview viewer use search pattern with escaped javascript regexp
 special characters

timeline.bodyText:
Better is to use an enum here, eg.. EscapMode, with java and javascript as values:
https://www.teamten.com/lawrence/programming/prefer-enums-over-booleans.html
timeline.author: Siedlerchr

timeline.bodyText: You can use Pattern.compile to gain some performace improvements here
timeline.author: Siedlerchr

timeline.bodyText: Please extract this to a regular if-else, it's easier to understand on the first look than this chained conditions
timeline.author: Siedlerchr

timeline.message:
Refactoring and performance improvement

* use enum to specify special characters escape mode

* use compiled regex pattern instead of string
